name: Sacrifice (V)
Lore: 'Jabba''s minions could be expected to be sacrificed to save the Hutt, to destroy one of the Hutts enemies or to provide the Hutt and his minions with a good laugh.',
Text: 'If opponent just initiated a battle, target your non-immune to Alter Effect on table. Draw destiny. Place target on Used Pile and activate up to X Force if destiny < X, where X = target''s destiny number.',
